document.title: Directory of Tennessee Municipal Officials 1991
document.abstract: A directory of Tennessee cities that includes personnel and municipal data, such as number of employees, population, charter form, size in square miles, and election date, for 1991.

field.name: comments
field.value:
Pages 69-70 are missing from the original.

Tennessee municipalities were contacted once a year to update the information listed in this directory. Changes in that information may have occurred between the contact date and the date of this printed directory. For accurate historical information, please contact the municipality directly.
